full_summary:
# Large Scale Temporary Help Services Needed

## Tender Details


| **Field** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Title (English) | NPP – S4531717 - THS SA – One (1) Computer Application Support. Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR). |
| Title (French) | APM – S4531717 - AMA SAT – Un (1) Informatique, soutien aux applications. Les services d'aide temporaire dans le cadre de l’arrangement en matière d'approvisionnement pour la région de la capitale nationale. |
| Ref. Number | cb-7444-8551700 |
| Solicitation Number | S4531717 |
| Tender Closing Date and Time | July 26, 2023, 11:00 a.m. |
| Contracting Entity | Department of National Defense (Ministère de la Défense Nationale) |

## Background Information

The Department of National Defense (Ministère de la Défense Nationale) requires the services of Temporary Help Support as per Supply Arrangement EN578-172870 (l'arrangement en matière d'approvisionnement numéro EN578-172870) for the National Capital Region (Région de la capitale nationale).

## Requirements

The selected supplier(s) must provide Temporary Help Services to support the DND's computer application support requirements.

## Security Clearance

A minimum Enhanced Reliability Security Clearance is required for all resources.

## Notice Requirements

The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.

## Important Documents

Access to the tender documents is available through Canada Buys.

## Contact Information

**Department of National Defense (Ministère de la Défense Nationale)**
60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K2H 8G1, Canada
Phone: (613) 971-7955
Email: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca) | Formatado com Markdown para a linha de comando. 

As necessidades do governo estão sempre mudando, então é importante estar atualizado com os recursos mais recentes em oferta.  

Você pode reparar se os meus editores foram mais longo para formatar o texto em Markdown, mas
